description:
This innovative video training will teach you how to grow your business and improve results by connecting with your customers, vendors, employees, and your community. You will ignite your personal and professional life through connecting with people.
Based on the book, "Everyone Communicates, Few Connect" by John Maxwell, the instructor takes you deeper into understanding how to connect with people to produce growth.

The 60 minute video training will feature the instructor speaking directly to you and teaching you to connect to your business. In addition, she added her innovative leader journal for the students to dive deeper!

Join the over 300 people in this training and improve your personal and professional growth by connecting with people!
title: Grow Your Business By Connecting
